c74object.name: hoa.2d.encoder~
c74object.description: hoa.2d.encoder~ creates the circular harmonics of a signal depending of a given order (arg 1) and a position on a circle given in radians (right inlet).

metadatalist.metadata: Julien Colafrancesco, Pierre Guillot, Eliott Paris.

objarg.name: ambisonic-order
objarg.description: First argument is the ambisonic order of decomposition.

method.name: float
method.digest: Set the azimuth of the encoding in radians
method.description: The float method sets the azimuth of the encoding in radians (between 0. and 2π).

method.name: int
method.digest: Set the azimuth of the encoding in radians
method.description: The int method sets the azimuth of the encoding in radians (between 0 and 2π).

method.name: signal
method.digest: Signal to encode / azimuth of the encoding in radians.
method.description: In the left inlet, the signal to encode. In The right inlet : set the azimuth of the encoding in radians
